objects.text: Super Solution for the Biggest, Brightest Bubbles • Non-toxic & Eco-friendly

product_details.description: This top secret “super solution” has been formulated to create the biggest, brightest, most colorful bubbles on earth! You’ll be ready for hours and hours of fun with your favorite gazillion products with this oversized solution refill bottle. This premium solution is eco-friendly, safe, non-toxic, and will not stain clothing or furniture. With Gazillion Bubbles, you’ll run out of breath before you run out of bubbles! Great Bubbles for Kids.  Appropriate for ages 3 years and up. Multi-color.

banner_details:
The banner features a vibrant and playful design perfect for promoting a children's product. It uses a soft radial gradient background from light blue to sky blue, overlaid with semi-transparent, scattered white bubbles to simulate a fun and bubbly atmosphere. Positioned centrally is a colorful bottle image representing the product, scaled and centered for visual impact. Above the product, text object **heading** displays a bold, purple-toned brand name. Just below, **subheading** presents bright green product identification text. The **tagline** underneath provides a brief description in a light purple font. Supporting text **description** offers additional details in dark gray, while the **price** tag, in a prominent purple font, stands out beneath it. A vivid green, rounded **cta_button** with white **cta** text entices users to take action. Decorative wave lines in purple and green towards the bottom complete the banner’s dynamic design. 

**Color Palette:**
- Purple (#8A2BE2)
- Bright Green (#32CD32)
- Sky Blue (#87CEEB)
- Soft Blue (#C4E3FF)
- White (#FFFFFF)
- Dark Gray (#333333)
product_color: The product image features a vibrant and playful color palette ideal for a children's product advertisement. The primary highlight is a bright neon green liquid (#7CFC00), representing excitement and fun, which dominates the bottle. The purple cap (#800080) and label background (#8A2BE2) offer a bold contrast, making the logo pop. The logo text blends lime green (#ADFF2F) and purple (#6A0DAD) with orange-yellow (#FFA500) outlines to catch attention immediately. Accents of blue (#87CEEB), yellow (#FFD700), and bubble highlights in white (#FFFFFF) and light lavender (#E6E6FA) bring extra dimension. The overall composition uses contrasting yet harmonious tones to maintain vibrance and clarity.
